title: privateChannelOnAddContextListener Event
description: An event message from the Desktop Agent to an app indicating that another app has added a context listener to a specific PrivateChannel.

privateChannelId.title: Private Channel Id
privateChannelId.description: The Id of the PrivateChannel that the listener was added to.

contextType.title: Context type
contextType.description: The type of the context listener added to the channel by another app, or null if it will listen to all types.
